metadata.title: CVE-2020-7021 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Elasticsearch versions before 7.10.0 and 6.8.14 have an informationdisclosure issue when audit logging and the emit_request_body option isenabled. The Elasticsearch audit log could contain sensitive informationsuch as password hashes or authentication tokens. This could allow anElasticsearch administrator to view these details.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
